message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $140. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of your product. I would like to propose a price of $125 for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your valuation and am willing to consider your offer. However, I would need to adjust my price slightly to $130 to ensure we can continue to provide the best service and quality to our customers.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility in pricing. I would like to counter with a price of $120 for the product.
